reviewText: Very Challenging platformer. Puzzles are difficult. The artwork is amazing, the scenery very well done. Great bang for the buck. Good story as well. Very good for an Indie game.

It takes alot of processor power for not a lot of payout. Its a very frustrating platformer with a zombie theme. There is some good puzzle potential but at 80 minutes of play I uninstalled and wish I hadnt paid for this.\n\nIf you like frustration and doing the same thing over and over again then this is the game for you. Still a neat take on zombie games and for that I applaud it. Now off to uninstall and play something else.

reviewText:
Product received for free

Adele is a nice looking Platformer, I really dig the art style and the music too, in this Game. The game got its standard platforming puzzles and even zombies too :) and i love zombies. I know a lot of people are tired of those.
While sometimes the controls can be a bit unresponsive, atleast to me (blame the controls right?) Its still a very nice game.
Worth picking this one up if you are into platformers.
